intro.title: Terms of Use for MLK Pro
intro.updated: Last update: {date}. This page is a template and should be reviewed before publication.

scope.title: 1. Scope
scope.body: These terms govern access to MLK Pro, a platform that helps businesses manage customers, quotes, jobs, tasks, invoices, products, and plan scans.

bullets.one: Accounts are created and managed by a business owner or admin.
bullets.two: You are responsible for keeping credentials secure.
bullets.three: Roles and permissions limit access to data and actions.

data.title: 3. Data ownership
data.body: Your company retains ownership of its data. By using MLK Pro, you grant the platform permission to store, process, and display your data as needed to provide the service.

bullets.one: Quotes are estimates and may vary based on site conditions and scope changes.
bullets.two: Price lookups use third-party sources and accuracy is not guaranteed.
bullets.three: You must validate supplier pricing before accepting or sending a quote.

billing.title: 5. Billing and payments
billing.body: Subscription fees, taxes, and payment terms are displayed in your billing settings. Unpaid invoices may result in limited access until resolved.

bullets.one: Do not upload unlawful content or misuse customer data.
bullets.two: Do not attempt to disrupt or reverse engineer the service.
bullets.three: Comply with applicable laws and client agreements.

availability.title: 7. Availability
availability.body: The platform is provided on an as-is basis. We may perform maintenance or updates that temporarily impact availability.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of liability
liability.body: MLK Pro is not liable for indirect damages, lost profits, or data loss beyond the limits required by law. Use the service at your own risk.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.body: You can cancel your subscription at any time. We may suspend access for violations of these terms or non-payment.

changes.title: 10. Changes
changes.body: We may update these terms. Continued use after changes means you accept the updated terms.

terms.note: Questions? Contact your account owner or use the in-app support channel.

hero.title: Plans built for field teams
hero.subtitle: Choose a plan that fits your workflow. Pricing is available on request.
hero.note: Need enterprise or custom limits? Request the pricing sheet.

starter.label: Starter
starter.desc: For small teams starting with quotes and jobs.

pro.label: Pro
pro.desc: For growing teams managing services and products.

enterprise.label: Enterprise
enterprise.desc: Advanced controls, multi-entity support, and SLA options.

items.two: Unified catalog for services and products
items.three: Plan scan pricing signals and sources

enterprise.title: Enterprise pricing sheet
enterprise.body: Request the enterprise sheet for custom limits, security review, and onboarding support.

intro.title: Privacy policy for MLK Pro
intro.summary: This policy explains how Malikia Pro collects, uses, and protects data on MLK Pro.

scope.title: 1. Scope
scope.body: This policy applies to the MLK Pro platform and related services.

data.title: 2. Data we collect
data.body: We collect account details, company information, usage data, and files you upload.

usage.title: 3. How we use data
usage.body: We use data to provide the service, improve features, and support your team.

sharing.title: 4. Data sharing
sharing.body: We share data with service providers only as needed to operate the platform. We do not sell personal data.

security.title: 5. Security
security.body: We use reasonable safeguards, access controls, and logging to protect your data.

retention.title: 6. Retention
retention.body: We keep data while your account is active or as required by law.

rights.title: 7. Your rights
rights.body: You can request access, correction, or deletion of data through your account owner.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.body: For privacy questions, contact support in the app.

privacy.note: If you have questions, contact support in the app.

intro.title: Refund policy for MLK Pro
intro.summary: This policy explains how refunds and credits are handled for MLK Pro subscriptions.

scope.title: 1. Scope
scope.body: Subscriptions are billed in advance and include access to MLK Pro features.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
eligibility.body: Refunds may be considered for duplicate charges or verified billing errors.

bullets.one: Change of mind after significant use.
bullets.two: Third-party fees or payment provider charges.

process.title: 4. How to request
process.body: Submit a request via in-app support with the invoice and reason for the refund.

timeline.title: 5. Processing time
timeline.body: If approved, refunds are issued to the original payment method. Processing time depends on the payment provider.

chargebacks.title: 6. Chargebacks
chargebacks.body: Chargebacks may pause access while we review the claim.

refund.note: Contact support if you need help with billing.
